channel.title: Java.lang.nullpointerexception
channel.description:
I run a server, and i average about 50 people online at a time. Every so often everyone on the server freezes, and i look on my VPS and the cmd is saying java.lang.nullpointerexception repeatedly. And the server does not un-null until i kickall. I cannot have this with my growing community, because if it nulls when no admins are on, it will stay nulled for a long time. it does not say where the null is at (ex: java.lang.nullpointerexception at src/...etc) so i have no idea whats going on.
It also will say it at random times when the server is on (pic related)
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/idrwi9.png[/img]
the repeated one is like this:
java.lang.nullpointerexception java.lang.nullpointerexception java.lang.nullpointerexception java.lang.nullpointerexception java.lang.nullpointerexception java.lang.nullpointerexception java.lang.nullpointerexception
just over and over again. anyone have any ideas?
EDIT: It is a 667 Loading 681

item.title: Java.lang.nullpointerexception
item.dc:creator: @ispynukes ispynukes
item.description:
@ispynukes wrote:

I run a server, and i average about 50 people online at a time.
Every so often everyone on the server freezes, and i look on my VPS and the cmd is saying
java.lang.nullpointerexception repeatedly. And the server does not un-null until i kickall.
I cannot have this with my growing community, because if it nulls when no admins are on, it will stay nulled for a long time.
it does not say where the null is at (ex: java.lang.nullpointerexception at src/…etc) so i have no idea whats going on.

It also will say it at random times when the server is on (pic related)
